channel.title: Shops, Npcs selling shops in testscape
channel.description: Like the title says how do i get NPCs with shops in testscape, i want them in the dummy training place area, like santa and dragon seller, barrow seller, also how do i do commands, i want to set some commands. Cheers =] Oh 1 last thing, how do i choose where the PK place is, i would liek everywhere Pk apart from inside the dummy training place, cheers :) :confused: :confused:

item.title: Shops, Npcs selling shops in testscape
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

Go to shops.cfg and add the ID of the shopkeeper and what you want to sell E.G;shop = 50 A_Shop 2 2 1 1 2 1 < don’t copy, just an example. Now safe and close and open up Autospawn.cfg and scroll down till u see: [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] and add above your npc, e.g; spawn = 1200 3457 9874 0 0 0 0 Tyras Guard Don’t copy, it’s just an example. Now safe and close and then open up client.java and search for aubury rune shop] and put this under the break:[code] } else if (NPCID == 1200) { //A Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 50; //A Shop and then safe and close and then compile
You just added a shop, but then edit the ID of the NPC and the ID’s of the items and stuff ^^
Hope I helped and have fun[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Shops, Npcs selling shops in testscape
